name: Pocket DJ Simulator
description:
Pocket DJ Simulator
Real DJ simulator - a simulation game where you can play on your phone as instruments for the DJ music! I enjoy writing music and songs? Do you have ears and you want to learn how to write the music for the clubs?
Create and write his music right in your pocket phone! Make a disco at home for friends, connect your phone to speakers and start recording!
In the game there are different bits Samples and music tracks, with the best record of our collections minus! There are lyrics, rock, hip-hop, dubstep, rap, and much more !!
Take a bit of your friends and show your setup for DJ! Let them know that you are able to reduce the tracks! Make your music star, surprise your loved ones! Become a member and top star! Dance to their own music and Make Friends!
Do Mix different tracks and bits!
Thank you for using our games and applications, leave your comments and we will consider them in future updates !!!
